channel.title: Homes on Kun Li
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kun Li

item.description: Biography I design and develop online courses with subject matter experts in higher education. I work on educational data mining projects. I conduct research based on learning sciences and instructional design models. My research interests include applying theories in learning science into real education settings, self-regulated learning in online environments and learning community.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I taught Technology Applications in Education for three semesters at Ohio University. This course introduces Web 2.0 tools and how they can be used in the classroom.
